Follow the sister when she meets the old man and kill him. Then offer the sister two options. One: Keep your whoring ways she he will expose her to everyone so she loses everyone she knows. Two: Become his slut and he will keep her secret, but keep the files hidden where he will be exposed if he doesn't text a certain number every day.

It was a long and hard fought battle but the brother and the old man are finally free and in the final plot twist they realize that they have feeling for each other and have passionate gay sex and live happily ever after. The End. It's debatable whether the final part of the story is need but I think that it is a fitting conclusion for this story. Also writing made me realize that there is a word limit lmao. I dont know why I wrote this but you're welcome.

Plot Twist: The brother grows up into a ripped chad who wants to get revenge on the old guy for turning his sister into a total slut. The brother devises a plan to get his sister back but in an even bigger plot twist it turns out that the sister was really the one pulling the strings the entire time and was actually the one abusing the old guy. She made it look like she was the one getting abused so she could she her brother suffer. In and even bigger plot twist the brother and the old man find out that the sister was really the evil one and come up with a plan to take care of the sister once and for all. They form a group of ten men so they can gangbang the sister and make her feel so much pleasure that she will become their slave. The sister turns out to be a very formidable foe and it takes the combined strength and the 10 men to successfully defeat her.
Someone in the family will find out then its over. And the revenge will be glorious.
